# currentPageIndicatorTintColor

**Instance Property**

The tint color to apply to the current page indicator.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var currentPageIndicatorTintColor: UIColor? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default color is an opaque white for the current page indicator dot. The current page indicator dot is used to indicate the currently visible page. Assigning a new value to this property does not automatically change the color in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageControl/pageIndicatorTintColor] property because the value for these two properties is not automatically derived from the other. Both properties must be specified independently.

## Coloring the page indicator

- **pageIndicatorTintColor**: The tint color to apply to the page indicator.
